examples: The dog barked at the mailman.
I took my dog for a walk in the park.
O cachorro latiu para o carteiro.
Eu levei meu cachorro para um passeio no parque.

suggested: Why do dogs always race to the door when the doorbell rings? Because they are great at door-ing.
It's sad when a stray dog can't find a loving home.
It's aggravating when a neighbor's dog barks constantly.
It's surprising how dogs can sense when their owners are coming home before they even arrive.
The smell of wet dog after a bath
The feeling of a dog's soft fur
The connection between a person and their companion dog
